channel.title: Requesting Advice
channel.description:
Hello,
I've been learning Java Language for a year and some months ago I passed the Java Exams.
My java knowledge is basic-intermediate so I would like to request advice on how can I get started programming my own sources or stuff for runescape private servers. I'm thinking of starting for 724 rsps.
What do you guys advice me?

item.title: Requesting Advice
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Arcik:

Sounds like your saying you don’t yet know how to program?

that’s what i am thinking, he said he passed the exams but if u can past the java exam’s i would recommend you doing something else than rsps’s. I know team_rocket (teem_rocket now) is starting his own game. Maybe you could help him out.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Advice
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Sounds like your saying you don’t yet know how to program?

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Advice
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

A little late, but my best advice is if you’re going to start out with anything and you have an intermediate understanding of java then I would say go with something like Hyperion. You can also looking on the RSwiki for more information about the 317/474/508 protocol, there are also quite a few interesting things to be read on the wiki as well. However, I would just try and familiarize myself with how servers operate and run at first and just do a few basic things and then slowly work my way into doing bigger things. Just my advice anyway. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting Advice
item.dc:creator: @Thevodkastudios Thevodkastudios
item.description:
@Thevodkastudios wrote:

[quote=“Alexis1999, post:1, topic:517511”]Hello,

I’ve been learning Java Language for a year and some months ago I passed the Java Exams.

My java knowledge is basic-intermediate so I would like to request advice on how can I get started programming my own sources or stuff for runescape private servers. I’m thinking of starting for 724 rsps.

What do you guys advice me?[/quote]

My advice? Get out of the community honestly… theres thousands of rsps… Just go out and extend your knowledge and learn to create your own game.

Read full topic
